description: Standard wallet UI/UX template for cross-platform reproduction (web, mobile, desktop)

layout.foldLines: between major sections, not overlapping controls
sections: header (logo 130px centered, title, subtitle, runtime config 2-col grid)
hero (network + assets, 2-col cards with glass background)

foldBehavior.halfFoldOverlay: 50% height, logo + network info bar at bottom
foldBehavior.halfFoldInfoBar: network · asset names, small muted text, bottom-aligned
foldBehavior.autoHalfFold: 30 seconds of inactivity in unfolded state

stitches.position: top and bottom, 16px inset from edges

embellishments.sheen: radial gradient, soft-light blend, 30% top-left origin

formFields.inputStyle: 6px radius, glass background, 1px border, focus ring
formFields.buttonPrimary: blue gradient, uppercase, hover lift + shadow deepen

themeTokens.darkThemeOverrides: panels, tabs, inputs, hero cards, results use rgba(0,0,0,0.2–0.45) backgrounds with rgba(255,255,255,0.10–0.15) borders

notes: Fold lines use edge color, are slightly faded, and do not touch controls. Pattern, glass, and color tokens are reusable across platforms. Dark themes require contrast overrides for all interactive elements.
